TeamQuest Corporation, based in
Clear Lake, Iowa ,
United States
is a computer software company specializing in
Systems management
and Performance and Capacity management software for computer servers.
History
TeamQuest was founded in 1991 by three employees from a software research and development group at
Unisys Corporation.
Products
The following products are developed by TeamQuest:
TeamQuest IT Service Applications Suite
TeamQuest IT Service Analyzer http://www.teamquest.com/solutions-products/products/it-service-analyzer/index.htm
TeamQuest IT Service Reporter http://www.teamquest.com/solutions-products/products/it-service-reporter/index.htm
TeamQuest Model http://www.teamquest.com/solutions-products/products/model/index.htm
TeamQuest Alert http://www.teamquest.com/solutions-products/products/alert/index.htm
TeamQuest View http://www.teamquest.com/solutions-products/products/it-service-analyzer/view/index.htm
TeamQuest On the Web http://www.teamquest.com/solutions-products/products/it-service-reporter/tqweb/index.htm
As a spin-off from
Unisys Corporation, TeamQuest also provides software for the following mainframe platforms:
ClearPath/IX Systems http://www.teamquest.com/solutions-products/products/unisys/os-2200-systems/index.htm
ClearPath/MCP Systems http://www.teamquest.com/solutions-products/products/unisys/mcp-systems/index.htm
TeamQuest IT Service Applications
These products are rich web applications hosted by a TeamQuest Application Server powered by Apache Tomcat. Thus they run entirely within the operator's web browser. The TeamQuest IT Service Applications share a common technology called TeamQuest IT Resources. This technology makes it possible to break down a large number of servers - and other IT resources such as workloads, virtual servers, network devices, disk devices, etc. - into smaller manageable groups, report on those groupings, and show relationships between IT resources. The TeamQuest IT Service Applications are tightly integrated and share a common look and feel.
TeamQuest IT Service Analyzer
TeamQuest IT Service Analyzer is an interactive performance and capacity investigation and diagnostic tool used for ad-hoc reporting on TeamQuest IT Resources (see section about TeamQuest IT Service Applications.)
TeamQuest IT Service Reporter
TeamQuest IT Service Reporter is a report publishing tool for creating newsletter-style reports or dashboard views of performance and capacity management information about IT resources. Reports can be exported for
Portable Document Format
and Microsoft Office Excel.
TeamQuest Model
TeamQuest Model is a capacity planning tool, capable of predicting aspects of hardware performance and capacity such as utilization, throughput and response time. Performance and capacity data collected by TeamQuest agents is used to construct a queuing network model, which is a mathematical representation of the relationship between software load and hardware components during a given period of time.
TeamQuest Alert
TeamQuest Alert is a hybrid product combining classic Event monitoring with Performance management. It is a Java-based application that runs on the operator's workstation. Events, alarms, and performance rule of thumbs for groups of servers and applications are rendered in several Red-Amber-Green (RAG) views.
TeamQuest View
TeamQuest View is a sophisticated Performance management tool, capable of real-time and historical data analysis of server and application metrics, cause-and-effect drill-down operations, and correlation analysis.
TeamQuest On the Web
TeamQuest On the Web is a web-based reporting tool.
